languages.text: Культ Последнего восхода отравил запасы воды в колонии — любой, выпивший ее, уподобляется безмозглым животным.
The Cult of the Final Dawn has poisoned the colony's water supplies — all who drink from the tainted sources turn into mindless animals.
languages.original_text: Культ Последнего восхода отравил запасы воды в колонии — любой, выпивший ее, уподобляется безмозглым животным.

traits.locale_text: The Cult of the Final Dawn has poisoned the colony's water supplies — all who drink from the tainted sources turn into mindless animals.

The Cult of the Final Dawn has poisoned the colony's water supplies — all who drink from the tainted sources turn into mindless animals.

languages.text: Le Culte de l'Aube finale a empoisonné les sources d'eau de la colonie. Quiconque boit l'eau contaminée se transforme en animal sauvage.
languages.original_text: The Cult of the Final Dawn has poisoned the colony's water supplies — all who drink from the tainted sources turn into mindless animals.

traits.locale_text: Le Culte de l'Aube finale a empoisonné les sources d’eau de la colonie. Quiconque boit l'eau contaminée se transforme en animal sauvage.

languages.text: 最後の夜明け魔女団がコロニーの水源を汚染した。汚染された水源から水を飲んだ者は皆、心なき獣と化した。
languages.original_text: The Cult of the Final Dawn has poisoned the colony's water supplies — all who drink from the tainted sources turn into mindless animals.

traits.locale_text: 最後の夜明け魔女団がコロニーの水源を汚染した。汚染された水源から水を飲んだ者は皆、心なき獣と化した。

languages.text: 终末黎明邪教分子污染了殖民地的水源，所有饮用不洁之水的人都变成了失去理智的怪物。
languages.original_text: The Cult of the Final Dawn has poisoned the colony's water supplies — all who drink from the tainted sources turn into mindless animals.

traits.locale_text: 终末黎明邪教分子污染了殖民地的水源，所有饮用不洁之水的人都变成了失去理智的怪物。

languages.text: El Culto del Amanecer Final ha envenenado las reservas de agua de la colonia. Quienes beben del líquido mancillado se convierten en animales descerebrados.
languages.original_text: The Cult of the Final Dawn has poisoned the colony's water supplies — all who drink from the tainted sources turn into mindless animals.

traits.locale_text: El Culto del Amanecer Final ha envenenado las reservas de agua de la colonia. Quienes beben del líquido mancillado se convierten en animales descerebrados.

languages.text: Der Kult der letzten Dämmerung hat die Wasservorräte der Kolonie vergiftet — jeder, der aus den vergifteten Quellen trinkt, wird zur stumpfsinnigen Bestie.
languages.original_text: The Cult of the Final Dawn has poisoned the colony's water supplies — all who drink from the tainted sources turn into mindless animals.

traits.locale_text: Der Kult der letzten Dämmerung hat die Wasservorräte der Kolonie vergiftet — jeder, der aus den vergifteten Quellen trinkt, wird zur stumpfsinnigen Bestie.
